title: Swiendlakalo swa nkoka & ku boxiwa - Orbital Temple
heading: Swiendlakalo swa nkoka & Ku boxiwa
description: Ntirho lowu wa vutshila wa malembe yo tala i xiphemu xa Mercosul Bienal ya vu-13 ePorto Alegre, Brazil, leyi hlayisiweke hi Marcelo Dantas. Yi vekiwile eka nxaxamelo wo leha eka Sagwadi ra Lumen Prize 2022 - Futures Award. Yi tlhele yi hlula eka Xiyenge xa ArtSat xa mphikizano wa CubeDesign 2021, lowu tlakusiweke hi Nhlangano wa Vulavisisi bya le Xibakabakeni wa le Brazil (INPE).

imageAlts.mercosul: Mercosur Biennial ya lembe na lembe
